Returns
Type Description
Task<(SelfAssignedRolesService.AssignResult Result, bool AutoDelete, object extra)>

A task that represents the asynchronous operation and contains the result of the operation, a boolean indicating whether auto-deletion is enabled, and an extra object containing additional information about the operation.

GetAdAndRoles(ulong)

Retrieves the auto-delete, exclusive, and self-assignable roles for a guild.

Declaration
public Task<(bool AutoDelete, bool Exclusive, IEnumerable<SelfAssignedRole>)> GetAdAndRoles(ulong guildId)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong guildId

The ID of the guild to retrieve the information for.
Returns
Type Description
Task<(bool AutoDelete, bool Exclusive, IEnumerable<SelfAssignedRole>)>

A task that represents the asynchronous operation and contains a tuple with a boolean indicating whether auto-deletion is enabled, a boolean indicating whether exclusive self-assignable roles are enabled, and a collection of self-assignable roles.
| Edit this page View Source

GetRoles(IGuild)

Retrieves the exclusive setting, self-assignable roles, and group names for a guild.

Declaration
public Task<(bool Exclusive, IEnumerable<(SelfAssignedRole Model, IRole Role)> Roles, IDictionary<int, string> GroupNames)> GetRoles(IGuild guild)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IGuild guild

The guild to retrieve the information for.
Returns
Type Description
Task<(bool Exclusive, IEnumerable<(SelfAssignedRole Model, IRole Role)> Roles, IDictionary<int, string> GroupNames)>

A task that represents the asynchronous operation and contains a tuple with a boolean indicating whether exclusive self-assignable roles are enabled, a collection of tuples containing self-assignable role models and their corresponding roles, and a dictionary mapping group numbers to their names.
| Edit this page View Source
